item.title: Trump: GOP Should 'Nationalize' Elections
item.description: President Donald Trump said in an interview Monday that Republicans should nationalize elections.

item.title: Hegseth: US 'More Than Prepared' if Iran Refuses Deal
item.description: War Secretary Pete Hegseth on Monday said the U.S. is "more than prepared" to act should Iran refuse to negotiate on its nuclear enrichment program.

item.title: Cuban Diplomat: No Dialogue With the US, but We're Open to One
